thread.title: Indians announce date single-game tickets will go on sale online
thread.title_full: Indians announce date single-game tickets will go on sale online

title: Indians announce date single-game tickets will go on sale online
text:
Feb 8, 2017 at 4:25p ET 0Shares 
CLEVELAND —The American League Champion Cleveland Indians will put single-game tickets on sale to the public on Monday, March 6, online only at Indians.com . There will be no sales at the Progressive Field Team Shop or Ticket Office until Monday, March 13. 
Limited inventory will be available for the team’s Home Opener on April 11 vs. the White Sox during the public on-sale on March 6. Additionally, lower bowl tickets for prime summer weekend games are sold out or nearly sold out; the Indians encourage fans to purchase early to lock in this year’s best games at the lowest prices. 
As always, Indians Season Ticket Holders will receive priority access to Home Opener and single-game tickets. The deadline for new Season Ticket purchasers to guarantee priority access is Monday, Feb. 20 at 5PM. Fans interested in purchasing Season Tickets and guaranteeing priority access to single-game tickets can call 216-420-4487. 
Indians Season Ticket packages, in addition to Home Opener priority, provide other great perks:– Postseason priority– Significant cost savings over Single Game prices– Annual summer Season Ticket Holder autograph party– And much more
